title: uninitialized constant Fastlane::PluginSearch::Terminal crash (again)
body:
### New Issue Checklist - [x] Updated fastlane to the latest version - [x] I read the [Contribution Guidelines](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) - [x] I read [docs.fastlane.tools](https://docs.fastlane.tools) - [x] I searched for [existing GitHub issues](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/issues) ### Issue Description ``` > fastlane search_plugins junit [âœ”] ðŸš€ [15:08:51]: Get started using a Gemfile for fastlane https://docs.fastlane.tools/getting-started/ios/setup/#use-a-gemfile [15:08:51]: Looking for fastlane plugins containing 'junit'... Looking for related GitHub issues on fastlane/fastlane... Found no similar issues. To create a new issue, please visit: https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/issues/new Run `fastlane env` to append the fastlane environment to your issue /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/fastlane-2.97.0/fastlane/lib/fastlane/plugins/plugin_search.rb:33:in `print_plugins': [!] uninitialized constant Fastlane::PluginSearch::Terminal (NameError) from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/fastlane-2.97.0/fastlane/lib/fastlane/commands_generator.rb:327:in `block (2 levels) in run' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/commander-fastlane-4.4.6/lib/commander/command.rb:178:in `call' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/commander-fastlane-4.4.6/lib/commander/command.rb:153:in `run' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/commander-fastlane-4.4.6/lib/commander/runner.rb:476:in `run_active_command' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/fastlane-2.97.0/fastlane_core/lib/fastlane_core/ui/fastlane_runner.rb:75:in `run!' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/commander-fastlane-4.4.6/lib/commander/delegates.rb:15:in `run!' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/fastlane-2.97.0/fastlane/lib/fastlane/commands_generator.rb:332:in `run' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/fastlane-2.97.0/fastlane/lib/fastlane/commands_generator.rb:41:in `start' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/fastlane-2.97.0/fastlane/lib/fastlane/cli_tools_distributor.rb:108:in `take_off' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/fastlane-2.97.0/bin/fastlane:20:in `' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/bin/fastlane:23:in `load' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/bin/fastlane:23:in `
' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/bin/ruby_executable_hooks:15:in `eval' from /Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/bin/ruby_executable_hooks:15:in `
' ``` I found workaround for me: I adopted idea from closed issue https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/issues/12293#issuecomment-381526050 and added `require 'terminal-table'` to the `/Users/itceglevskii/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.4.0/gems/fastlane-2.97.0/fastlane/lib/fastlane/plugins/plugin_search.rb` It fixes crash: ``` > fastlane search_plugins junit [âœ”] ðŸš€ [15:25:01]: Get started using a Gemfile for fastlane https://docs.fastlane.tools/getting-started/ios/setup/#use-a-gemfile [15:25:01]: Looking for fastlane plugins containing 'junit'... +--------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+ | fastlane plugins 'junit' | +--------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+ | Name | Description | Downloads | +--------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+ | merge_junit_report | Merges multiple junit reports into one | 19434 | | test_center | This fastlane plugin includes the following actions: | 15760 | | | 1) multi_scan: uses scan to run Xcode tests, optionally in | | skip bottom of table ``` For me it seems like a bug. ##### Complete output when running fastlane, including the stack trace and command used 
fastlane search_plugins junit --capture_output  
[âœ”] ðŸš€ 
[15:18:54]: Get started using a Gemfile for fastlane https://docs.fastlane.tools/getting-started/ios/setup/#use-a-gemfile
DEBUG [2018-06-08 15:18:54.99]: Checking if there are any plugins that should be loaded...
INFO [2018-06-08 15:18:55.11]: Looking for fastlane plugins containing 'junit'...

### fastlane files:


`./fastlane/Fastfile`

```ruby
# This file contains the fastlane.tools configuration
# You can find the documentation at https://docs.fastlane.tools
#
# For a list of all available actions, check out
#
#     https://docs.fastlane.tools/actions
#

# Uncomment the line if you want fastlane to automatically update itself
# update_fastlane

default_platform(:ios)

platform :ios do
  desc "Description of what the lane does"
  lane :custom_lane do
    # add actions here: https://docs.fastlane.tools/actions

  end

  desc "Runs all the tests"
  lane :test do
    # Perform all of the tests in the project
    scan
  end
end

```
